description: Use 2-in-1 shampoo to shorten the amount of time spent in the shower.

action: Bike Instead Of Drive When Possible
description: Let's face it. Most of the time
you simply can't get somewhere without driving a car. But keep an eye out for those times that you can walk or ride a bike. Stop and smell the roses!

action: Put AC On A Timer At Night
description: Do you leave the AC on all night? If so
do you need it all night
or do you just need it to go to sleep? Try putting it on a timer. Even if it goes off 5 hours after you've been asleep
that's still a few hours it would have been on unnecessarily. Save money and electricity.
